articles.title: Asus Is Making Its Own Handheld Gaming PC to Compete with Steam Deck - IGN
articles.description: Asus is creating its very first handheld PC seeking to compete with the Steam Deck called the ROG Ally. Despite dropping the trailer for it on April Fools' Day, it's legit.
articles.content:
Asus is developing its very first gaming handheld PC, the ROG Ally, to compete with the Steam Deck. 
Although the company released the trailer for the PC gaming handheld on April Fools' Day over the… [+1996 chars]

articles.title: Sony's next pair of budget earbuds will reportedly cost $120 when they arrive this month | Engadget - Engadget
articles.description: According to a deleted Best Buy listing, Sony's upcoming WF-C700N earbuds will cost $120 when they arrive later this month, and will include ANC support..
articles.content:
Sonys upcoming WF-C700N earbuds have leaked courtesy of Best Buy. In a listing spotted by WinFutures
 Roland Quandt
, the retailer revealed the true wireless buds will go on sale on April 21st for … [+1158 chars]
